comment.author: 84344849@N00
comment._content: This is a wonderful series.  I have been in St. Sophia, and realize its history.  These photos help put that history in visual perspective.  To my mind it is good to share history, in photo form or otherwise, with as many people as possible.  The future is shaped by understanding history.  These photos are just beautiful.

comment.author: 9019841@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Orthodox Church Architecture, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
